common.privacyTxt:
Privacy Policy
Effective date: 2025-06-25

Information we collect
• Account data: When you register or log in, we collect your email address and a one-way encrypted password for identification and credit calculation.  
• Image data: Uploaded images are processed in the cloud and temporarily cached for up to 24 hours, then permanently deleted.  
• Payment data: If paid features are introduced in the future, we will collect and process your payment-method information through third-party providers (e.g., Stripe, Alipay, WeChat Pay); this platform does not store any plain-text card numbers or CVV codes.

How we use the information
1. Create and maintain your account; 2. Calculate and display credits; 3. Provide, improve and charge for services; 4. Send service notices and invoices.

Cookies & local storage
We set essential cookies only to keep you logged in and to remember UI preferences; these data are not shared with any third party.

Third-party services
We currently do not embed analytics, advertising or social-media pixels; any future addition will be updated on this page.

Children
The site is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

Data retention & deletion
• Account information: retained until you actively delete the account or the account is inactive for 3 consecutive years.  
• Image cache: automatically deleted after 24 hours.  
• Payment records: kept for 7 years as required by tax law, then anonymized.

Your rights
You can view, correct or delete your account at any time in “My Account”; after deletion we will stop collecting and delete identifiable information.

Changes to this policy
Material changes (e.g., new data types or purposes) will be prominently announced on this page 7 days before taking effect.

Contact
Questions?Email us at:mengshikejiwang@163.com
common.contactTxt:
Contact
Questions? Email us at: mengshikejiwang@163.com
We usually reply within 24 hours, Monday to Friday.
common.serviceTxt:
Terms of Service
Effective date: 2025-06-25

1. Acceptance
By using EditPixelAI you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please stop using the service.

2. Service description
We provide online image-editing tools such as “person removal”. Uploaded images are processed in the cloud, temporarily cached for 24 hours and then permanently deleted.

3. Copyright and license
You must own or have lawful rights to any image you upload. You are solely responsible for any dispute arising from copyright or third-party rights infringement.

4. Prohibited conduct
• Upload content that is pornographic, violent, hateful or illegal;
• Reverse-engineer, scrape or attack our servers;
• Resell or sublicense the service or its outputs.
We may suspend or delete your account without refund for violations.

5. Credits and payments
Sign-up credits are free; additional credits must be purchased. All payments are final and non-refundable unless required by mandatory law.

6. Disclaimer
We strive for accuracy but do not guarantee 100 % success or fitness for commercial use. Our maximum liability shall not exceed the amount you actually paid us in your most recent transaction.

7. Changes to terms
Material changes will be posted on this page and take effect 7 days later. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

8. Termination
You may delete your account at any time in “My Account”; remaining credits will be forfeited and cannot be recovered.

9. Governing law
These terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China; disputes shall be submitted to the competent courts at our location.

10. Contact
Email: mengshikejiwang@163.com
